channel.title: CVE Feed for LG Electronics -- LG LED Assistant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LG Electronics -- LG LED Assistant

item.title: CVE-2024-2862|2024-03-25T06:33:31.760Z -- LG Electronics -- LG LED Assistant
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to reset the password of anonymous users without authorization on the affected LG LED Assistant.

item.title: CVE-2024-2863|2024-03-25T08:41:29.086Z -- LG Electronics -- LG LED Assistant
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to traverse paths via file upload on the affected LG LED Assistant.
